commit.message:
Chmod each copied file a+r.

From-SVN: r2988

files.patch:
@@ -145,6 +145,7 @@ while [ $# != 0 ]; do
       if [ -r $file ]; then
 	cp $file $2/$file >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "Can't copy $file"
 	chmod +w $2/$file
+	chmod a+r $2/$file
 
 # The following have been removed from the sed command below
 # because it is more useful to leave these things in.
@@ -218,6 +219,7 @@ if [ \! -z "$file_to_fix" ]; then
     echo Fixed $file_to_fix
     rm -f ${LIB}/$file
     cp /tmp/$base ${LIB}/$file
+    chmod a+r ${LIB}/$file
   fi
   rm -f /tmp/$base
 fi
@@ -246,6 +248,7 @@ if [ \! -z "$file_to_fix" ]; then
     echo Fixed $file_to_fix

   fi
   rm -f /tmp/$base
 fi
@@ -268,6 +271,7 @@ if [ \! -z "$file_to_fix" ]; then
   echo Checking $file_to_fix
   cp $file_to_fix /tmp/$base
   chmod +w /tmp/$base
+  chmod a+r /tmp/$base
   ex /tmp/$base <<EOF
   /^#define[ 	]*NULL[ 	]*0$/c
 #ifndef NULL

 fi

 fi
